WRITING.TEXT: Do you live in Nigeria? Making drama for 7 bucks, at least you didn't lose really big amounts like most people.
pm link please

My parents are as retarded dude. One time I was quarelling with my dad and out of nothing he called the cops and told them that I used some type of drug. Another day I woke up sick and my fucking racist doctor told my parents to have me tested on drugs! Just because I didn't feel good!
Drinking the dope??
That last sentence sent me back in time ... I feel you bro :(
Hope you'll never end up getting ripped or robbed man, I have never seen such an amount of money in my life because I can't find any customers...
Old one from 2016
Suffering from depression

I fucking hate my phone so much but if I destroy it my parents won't be able to contact me anymore and since I have pretty bad anxiety everytime somebody asks me if I have any type of social media it really makes me afraid.

There's a girl in my class that says she has a crush on me but I don't fucking believe her. She never pays attention to me, never sends me any messages and doesn't seem to care at all. I think she's doing it because she needs emotional support, and that when she's stable again she will kick me out of her life.
After having stopped my oversensivity with substances I can assure you that I think it's better for me like this. I gave up on everything and I don't expect anything out of life.
I'm completely destroyed, I can't handle people touching me anymore.
Be like me, stay home all day. No pain, no feelings.
Man ... what an amazing story ... I feel horribly sorry for you ... I think I'm glad that nobody ever got to do the same thing to me when I read this.

WRITING.TITLE: Is snorting meth once worth it?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm thinking about trying meth once in my life but there are a million people saying that it's the most addictive thing ever, that the comedowns are hell and that it will permanently damage your brain. This can't be true right?
Lmao
Planning on doing the same but I've got a baggie of fucking strong pure synthetic and I don't wanna die.
Goodbye dude, hope you have a painless death.

WRITING.TITLE: Just another worthless day passing by ...
WRITING.TEXT: Am I the only one experiencing this? You wake up in the morning after an amazing dream, you think for a second where you are and then you realize you're in your bedroom and not dead yet, and it's gonna be another fucking boring day. You go to school and see those people again that pretend to be your friends, they ask you how you are and you just answer 'fine' like always. When you finally come home you feel tired and empty and you haven't been paying attention to a single lesson. You'll try to eat something nice to feel better, but it doesn't help, you try going outside, but you have no one to join you, you want to study for your future, but you're constantly telling yourself that it's pointless, you want to be busy with your hobbies, but you have no motivation and feel guilty for everything you do. I've been like this for freaking months and even though I visit the psychiatrist frequently those conversations with her only make me feel worse and anxious. I also feel like depression killed half of my braincells because lately I'm having a hard time remembering people's name and shit. If I don't get help soon I'm sure that it'll be the fucking end for me.

Oh, well I always seem to come close to suicide whenever life is being a bitch again but lately I've been locking myself up for my own safety so no worries. Just when I thought that someone was finally going to escape from the curse called life.
My friends indeed hate me for using drugs and damn I never get invited to parties ...
Can't you add any sort of scent to make it taste better?

I fucking hate my parents too man, they're one of the main reasons that I'm depressed as shit and only see evil inside of me. I always have to get the best grades, be better than others and they don't fucking leave me alone. And when you ask them why they're doing this they'll respond with 'it's for your own good'.
No, stop.
Goodbye my friend, hope we will meet one day when this shitty world comes to its end.

If you wanna experience death, try psychedelics to make sure you won't regret it. I smoked synthetic weed last month and it sent me to hell. I didn't regret anything and even if it hurt alot I was glad that I wasn't alive anymore. Just a few hours later I woke up and felt like I had lost something.

I had a girlfriend and it made me anxious as fuck, constantly worrying that I'm not enough, jealous at everyone that talks to her and in the end I only hurt myself. Don't try it please, it's fine like this.
Bye my dude, hope you will get what you wished for.
Yes, but I'm not going to commit suicide, I prefer being a life long drug addict instead of killing myself.

WRITING.TITLE: Re: depression memes
WRITING.TEXT: Am I the only person that wants to smash his skull against the wall when he sees another shitty meme about depression or anxiety? I bet that 99% of the people that consider these as funny are faking their depression. Most of the time they don't even make any sense and are very bland. I don't understand how people can think that memes about something they're suffering from everyday can be funny.
Showers used to make my day better now they only cause me headaches.

WRITING.TITLE: How to study when you're hopeless
WRITING.TEXT: I'm having finals tomorrow, but after 5 minutes looking at my book I start staring for hours at the wall and I end up in thought loops. I really don't want to fail my finals but I know really good that studying is worthless if I'll end up killing myself anyway.
I used to watch alot of depression memes too in the past but I've realized that memes itself are immature and really stupid. Nothing can really make me smile anymore when I'm on my own.

WRITING.TITLE: Drinking water makes you less depressed.
WRITING.TEXT: If you ever looked up for tips and tricks to overcome depression, you'll most likely find people saying drink alot of of water and do yoga. I tried about a gallon of water everyday (4 liters) but I didn't fucking change anything. It only reduced my brain fog but other than that there was no difference. I'm not going to try yoga because doing sports make me very uncomfortable and I can't imagine how it would make me feel better.
Lmaoo

WRITING.TITLE: selfharm.pics isn't working?
WRITING.TEXT: Tried to sign up but can't receive confirmation email I really want to access the site but I can't.
Beauty in a nutshell.

WRITING.TITLE: Weird dream.
WRITING.TEXT: Last night I was scrolling through Instagram and a friend of mine was chilling with my ex-crush. 1.5 years ago I fell in love with her but she said that she didn't want to be with me anymore because I was loving her way too much. She also switched schools so I saw her less often. Months passed and I did all kinds of stupid shit for her to convince her to be with me, but she didn't accept anything, not even the silver ring I gave her (she told me that she threw it away). Around may 2018 I stopped contacting her and checking on her and minded my own business, but she was somehow always stuck in my head. When I encouraged myself to think of something positive, it was always her, even when I didn't love her anymore. But it didn't make me feel good, it filled me with guilt and sadness. So yesterday when I saw a picture of her I was first disgusted, but when I went to sleep later, I had a really weird dream. We were on a sort of playground. i saw her at the slide and first she looked away, but for some reason 2 of my cousins were there as well (they knew that I loved this girl and they made fun of me). I was talking first with my 2 cousins and I dropped a few jokes, and all of them started laughing. That's when I started to talk with my crush again, and she wasn't ignoring me, but I don't remember what we were talking again, because I suddenly woke up, disappointed that I didn't die in my sleep.
Yeah but I always get thin scars that you can't really see I wonder how people get these thick red/purple scars.
